body.p: The IASB noted that some view the concept of faithful representation in the Conceptual Framework as sufficient to identify the circumstances in which contracts should be combined. However, in the IASB’s view, it is beneficial to add more clarity as to when to combine contracts within the context of leases, particularly with respect to sale and leaseback transactions, short-term leases and leases of low-value assets.
